title: Worldcoin Could Enable Wider Distribution of Crypto Than Even Bitcoin, Says CoinFund
description: Worldcoin could onboard "billions of users" into crypto, said CoinFund.

title: Fashion Brand MNTGE's New NFTs Unlock Physical Patches From Noted Artists
description: MNTGE's Ethereum NFTs can be redeemed for patches from the likes of Jen Stark and OSF, along with Nyan Cat and Bored Ape Yacht Club artists.

title: NatWest Customer 'Debanked' for Crypto Trading Amid Nigel Farage Row
description: A Facebook group comprising 10,000 former NatWest customers is taking action against the bank's allegedly opaque debanking practices.

description: In a recent interview published on July 26, South Africa’s foreign minister Naledi Pandor highlighted the BRICS group of economies’ commitment to peace, asserting that these nations do not aim to “weaponize the oceans.” Moreover, leading up to the much-anticipated 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg next month, Pandor indicated that an announcement regarding the addition […]

title: BYTE CITY launches Bruce Lee tribute event in the metaverse
description: Legendary martial artist and actor Bruce Lee will be commemorated in a digital initiative within the metaverse by BYTE CITY, a next-gen social entertainment platform specializing in digital collectibles. This innovative partnership will create an immersive mobile metaverse experience where fans can engage with the martial arts icon and celebrate his life and philosophy. Bruce ... Read more

title: Optimism overtakes Arbitrum in daily transactions after Worldcoin launch
description: Onchain data reveals that Optimism, an Ethereum layer-2 platform, has overtaken Arbitrum in daily transactions for the first time
